targets.uql:
parse-json
| summarize "number of cities"=count(), "total population"=sum("population") by "country"
| extend "country"=toupper("country")
| order by "total population" desc

panels.title: parse-csv timeseries multiple columns and metrics

targets.uql:
parse-xml
| scope "CATALOG.CD"
| extend "YEAR"=todatetime("YEAR")
| summarize "average price"=mean("PRICE") by "COUNTRY"

targets.data:
---
-
    city: chennai
    country: india
    gdp: 12.3
    population: 123
-
    city: london
    country: uk
    gdp: 23
    population: 1432

targets.uql:
parse-json
| mv-expand "user"="users"
| project "group", "username"="user.username", "age"="user.age"
| summarize "total members"=count(),"average age"=mean("age") by "group"

options.content:
## Input
```json
{
  "server1": {
    "name": "server-1",
    "ip": "0.0.0.1",
    "disks": [{ "drive": "C", "size": 1024 },{ "drive": "D", "size": 2048 }]
  },
  "server2": {
    "name": "server-2",
    "ip": "0.0.0.2",
    "disks": [{ "drive": "C", "size": 2048 },{ "drive": "D", "size": 3096 }]
  }
}

```

## Query

```kusto
parse-json
| project kv() 
| project "name"="value.name", "ip"="value.ip", "disks"="value.disks"
| mv-expand "disk"="disks" 
| project "name", "ip", "driveName"="disk.drive", "driveSize"="disk.size"
| project-away "disk"
```

targets.uql:
parse-json
| project kv() 
| project "name"="value.name", "ip"="value.ip", "disks"="value.disks"
| mv-expand "disk"="disks" 
| project "name", "ip", "driveName"="disk.drive", "driveSize"="disk.size"
| project-away "disk"
